Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: As a Steward, I should be able to detect a 'new DID transaction' coming from an unauthorized DID
Issue.description: As a Steward, I should be able to: # Determine if a 'create new sovrin DID' transaction does NOT come from a DID authorized by a Trust Anchor# If #3 is true, I should be able to reject the transaction.
